Purpose: To detect and characterize genetic variants associated with hereditary pancreatitis for clinical diagnosis and patient management.
Container: Lavender-top EDTA tube (whole blood) or Oragene saliva collection kit
Equipment: Spectrophotometer (e.g., NanoDrop), PCR thermocycler, TapeStation or equivalent, and next-generation sequencer (e.g., Illumina MiSeq)
